properties.name: app.kafka.topic.name
properties.description: name of the default kafka topic.

properties.name: app.kafka.topic.customer-key
properties.description: key of the default kafka topic for Customer instance.

properties.name: app.kafka.topic.partitions
properties.description: number of partitions in the default kafka topic.

properties.name: app.kafka.topic.replicas
properties.description: number of replicas of the default kafka topic.
